title: But seriously, Riot, when will we be able to mute a specific teammate's pings?
body: Smart pings are nice and all, but it'd be nice to have a way to not have the entire chat box and minimap fill up with a million Missing Pings whenever someone gets tilted.

replies.body:
I am on the fence about this feature. although I want it some times, usually I am able to discern the clearly bad pings from the useful ones. an over ping spammer will give some decent pings sometimes (at least once per game), and that critical information can be worth dealing with their angry pings.

again it comes down to self control for not using a feature like this if implemented, or self control of not becoming tilted from their pings.

However, if a feature like this is implemented, it might increase the abuse of pingings, as it will be assumed that "Anyone who doesn't like it can just mute it".
Stop beating around the bush and just do it already, Riot. We all know you're gonna have to implement that eventually, no need to  drag this on more than it already has.
